declarations.comments: Repeat a monadic action indefinitely, `yield`ing each result
declarations.title: repeatM

declarations.comments: Repeat a monadic action a fixed number of times, `yield`ing each result
declarations.title: replicateM

declarations.comments: Consume all values using a monadic function
declarations.title: mapM_

declarations.comments: `discard` all incoming values
declarations.title: drain

declarations.comments: Apply a function to all values flowing downstream
declarations.title: map

declarations.comments: Apply a monadic function to all values flowing downstream
declarations.title: mapM

declarations.comments: Convert a stream of actions to a stream of values
declarations.title: sequence

declarations.comments: Apply a function to all values flowing downstream, and
declarations.title: mapFoldable

declarations.comments: `filter` only forwards values that satisfy the predicate.
declarations.title: filter

declarations.comments: `filterM` only forwards values that satisfy the monadic predicate
declarations.title: filterM

declarations.comments: `take n` only allows n values to pass through
declarations.title: take

declarations.comments: `takeWhile` allows values to pass downstream so long as they satisfy
declarations.title: takeWhile

declarations.comments: `takeWhile'` is a version of `takeWhile` that returns the value failing
declarations.title: takeWhile'

declarations.comments: drop discards n values going downstream
declarations.title: drop

declarations.comments: dropWhile discards values going downstream until one violates the
declarations.title: dropWhile

declarations.comments: Flatten all 'Foldable' elements flowing downstream
declarations.title: concat

declarations.comments: Outputs the indices of all elements that satisfied the predicate
declarations.title: findIndices

declarations.comments: Left scan
declarations.title: scan

declarations.comments: Monadic left scan
declarations.title: scanM

declarations.comments: Apply an action to all values flowing downstream
declarations.title: chain

declarations.comments: Convert `Show`able values to `String`s
declarations.title: show

declarations.comments:
Evaluate all values flowing downstream to WHNF

declarations.title: seq

declarations.comments: Fold of the elements of a `Producer`
declarations.title: fold

declarations.comments: Fold of the elements of a `Producer` that preserves the return value
declarations.title: fold'

declarations.comments: Monadic fold of the elements of a `Producer`
declarations.title: foldM

declarations.comments: Monadic fold of the elements of a `Producer`
declarations.title: foldM'

declarations.comments: all determines whether all the elements of p satisfy the predicate.
declarations.title: all

declarations.comments: any determines whether any element of p satisfies the predicate.
declarations.title: any

declarations.comments: Determines whether all elements are `True`
declarations.title: and

declarations.comments: Determines whether any element is `True`
declarations.title: or

declarations.comments: elem returns `True` if p has an element equal to a, `False` otherwise
declarations.title: elem

declarations.comments: notElem returns `False` if p has an element equal to a, `True` otherwise
declarations.title: notElem

declarations.comments: Find the first element of a `Producer` that satisfies the predicate
declarations.title: find

declarations.comments: Find the index of the first element of a `Producer` that satisfies the
declarations.title: findIndex

declarations.comments: Retrieve the first element from a `Producer`
declarations.title: head

declarations.comments: Index into a `Producer`
declarations.title: index

declarations.comments: Retrieve the last element from a `Producer`
declarations.title: last

declarations.comments: Count the number of elements in a `Producer`
declarations.title: length

declarations.comments: Find the maximum element of a `Producer`
declarations.title: maximum

declarations.comments: Find the minimum element of a `Producer`
declarations.title: minimum

declarations.comments: Determine if a `Producer` is empty
declarations.title: null

declarations.comments: Convert a pure `Producer` into a list
declarations.title: toList
